content.description: This is the prominent right-facing corner with a wide crack. It is the farthest right of the rock routes on the West Side. The bolted lines to the right of the corner are drytooling/mixed routes.
content.location: This route is easy to spot, the corner is quite obvious.  It is downstream a short distance from the pool.

content.description: This has sustained, bouldery, face climbing finishing with a blocky roof. It is a forgotten gem that cleans up nicely. Recommended.
content.location:
This is between

Bolted Crack

and

Cafe Cascade

.

content.description: Shady Lady has fun and balancy climbing up to the third bolt at a roof. Pull through the lower crux roof and enjoy good holds to a nice rest. Shake out, then pull the upper crux moves to the chains. This is enjoyable and varied climbing on good rock.
content.location:
It is the next route right of

El Moro

.

content.description: AKA Bolted Crack...this is an OK route and a rare moderate. Start in a corner with good edges, crack, and stemming. Then climb a steeper than it looks finish to the chains.
content.location:
This is the last route downstream on Restaurant Row (West Side) a little left of

Olde Tymer's

.

content.description:
This is a sweet, little crack (seam) thing that was toproped a while ago, and I bolted it this summer.

Ironically just before it was about to go, I showed the line to Chris Schulte after I bolted it, and he mentioned he TR'd back in the day. I told him to go for the FA, and he disposed of it pretty quickly.

He thought it was around 5.12a, but I thought for sure it was quite harder. Who knows, get on it!
content.location: This ascends an obvious overhanging seam on the left side of the crag.

content.description: Start by stemming up a nice corner with better hands and harder feet. After the third bolt the corner ends at a great rest. Move right onto the face, and follow pretty good holds to a steep and juggy finish through a small roof to end at chains.
content.location:
It is just left of

Peace Crack

.

content.description:
Climb the blunt arete and face with good holds past the first two bolts. At the third bolt, pull the crux roof. Then climb the steep and juggy finish to the chains. It shares the last bolt and anchors with

Aspen Cafe

.
content.location:
It is a little right of

Aspen Cafe

.

content.description: This is a nice, moderate sport climb that follows a shallow, right-facing corner feature with good holds and movement.
content.location:
Left of

Red Snapper

almost to the water treatment drainage, it is the farthest left route on the wall.

content.description: Start in a corner atop a small hill. Fun climbing with good holds and steep moves leads past a low roof. After bolt 2, a section of tricky stemming leads to some nice jugs. Pull around another smaller roof and finish with some balancy moves to the chains. This is another fun climb with good movement and good rock that deserves attention.
content.location:
It is the next route right of

Leneisha's

.

content.description: Climb a corner past the first couple bolts. Then fun face climbing leads to a steep finish past the last couple bolts. Good rock and movement make this a must do!
content.location:
This is the next route right of

Shady Lady

.

content.description: This is a difficult arete and face climb that doesn't seem to get much traffic. When cleaned up, it's a pretty line and a worthy challenge. The business is the first 4 bolts, then it is easier but slightly lower quality climbing to the chains.
content.location:
It is the nice arete to the right of

Diamond Belle

.

content.description:
This climbs the obvious, open-book corner that is capped by roofs. It's nice to stick clip the first bolt. Super fun, technical and powerful climbing up the perfect corner past the first two bolts leads to a crux from bolts two to three. Good edges, pockets, and pinches lead up and right out a stepped roof to the chains. This shares the last bolt and anchor with

Leneisha's

. This is a really good rock climb that deserves attention!
content.location:
It is between

Sow's Ear

and

Leneisha's

.
